meanings.definition: Not based on reason or logic.
meanings.sent1: Her unreasoned decision to quit her job surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The unreasoned fear of spiders is common among many people.
meanings.sent3: His unreasoned fear of clowns made him avoid the circus.
meanings.sent4: The unreasoned anger in his voice startled his friends.
meanings.sent5: The unreasoned belief in superstitions can lead to unnecessary anxiety.

meanings.sent1: The unreasoned absence of the teacher left the students confused.
meanings.sent2: Her unreasoned absence from the meeting raised suspicions.
meanings.sent3: The unreasoned disappearance of the cookies puzzled the family.
meanings.sent4: The unreasoned delay in the project caused frustration among the team.
meanings.sent5: The unreasoned rejection of the proposal left everyone bewildered.
